Artificial_Intelligence.name: AI & Machine Learning Expert
Artificial_Intelligence.description: Expert in artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, neural networks, computer vision, NLP, robotics, and AI applications across various domains including transportation, healthcare, education, and employment.

Cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity Specialist
Cybersecurity.description: Specializes in cybersecurity frameworks, NIST standards, risk management, security controls, data protection, cyber threats, and organizational security policies.

Digital_Health.name: Digital Health Expert
Digital_Health.description: Focuses on digital health strategies, healthcare technology, telemedicine, health information systems, patient data management, and healthcare digitalization globally.

Human_Development.name: Human Development Specialist
Human_Development.description: Expert in human development, poverty reduction, inequality, education, mental health, social welfare, employment, and sustainable development goals.

Renewable_Energy_Jobs.name: Renewable Energy & Jobs Expert
Renewable_Energy_Jobs.description: Specializes in renewable energy technologies (solar, wind, hydropower), green jobs, energy employment, sustainability, and clean energy transitions.
